column4: Can anyone answer me why I cant compile programs with a default ubuntu installation before I go though, does not make any sense to me at all..
programs for most users are available through repositories and they don't need to compile anything. Just installing the package build-essential will give you the tools required for compiling
I dont have an internet connection. trying to look for the .deb file to download now..
but it's a meta-package, so it holds nothing in itself, it's just a package to pull the dependencies
